content: this listing is for an instant download crochet pattern - you will not receive a physical item this crochet pattern will help you to create a mice pie christmas ornament **yule log ornament crochet pattern** create a cute handmade decoration for the holidays with this yule log christmas ornament crochet pattern perfect for advanced beginners this easy skill level project works up quickly using dk weight size 3 yarn making it an ideal last-minute decoration or gift designed as a charming hanging ornament it s a festive addition to your tree or holiday displays the yule log crochet pattern is available as a pdf instant download so you can start crocheting right away and bring some adorable homemade charm to your christmas decor the crochet pattern is 4 pages long and written in english and us crochet terms the pattern contains plenty of progress photos to guide you along and is an easy skill level project **supplies** dk / light worsted / #3 yarn 3mm & 4mm crochet hook scissors sewing needle 10mm safety eyes **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand stylecraft squeeze me dk a - brown b - white c - almond d - green e - red total 22 yards **gauge** 3mm hook 2 x 2 swatch = 10 row of 10 4mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 4 row of 7 double_crochet **finished size** height 5cm x length 6 5cm **abbreviations us terms ** chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet magic_ring - magic_ring r - row / round single_crochet - single_crochet 2sc - 2 single_crochet in 1 space increase decrease - single_crochet 2 together decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch st/sts - stitch/stitches **skill level** easy ** notes** a free online basic version of this crochet pattern is available at https //hookfully com/easy-crochet-yule-log-ornament-free-pattern/ due to the nature of the product no refunds will be issued
